httpdocs
Table of Contents

PostPaymentLinksPaymentLink

Updates a payment link.

HTTP Request

POST \v1\payment_links\{payment_link} HTTP/1.1

host: api.stripe.com:443
eTag: "23423432"
accept: application/json
content-type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded


{ "example": "Example goes here" }

Parameters

payment_link [ in: path type: string ]
required

Request Body Schema

{
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "active": {
      "type": "boolean",
      "description": "Whether the payment link's url is active. If false, customers visiting the URL will be shown a page saying that the link has been deactivated."
    },
    "after_completion": {
      "title": "after_completion_params",
      "required": [
        "type"
      ],
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "hosted_confirmation": {
          "title": "after_completion_confirmation_page_params",
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "custom_message": {
              "maxLength": 500,
              "type": "string"
            }
          }
        },
        "redirect": {
          "title": "after_completion_redirect_params",
          "required": [
            "url"
          ],
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "url": {
              "maxLength": 2048,
              "type": "string"
            }
          }
        },
        "type": {
          "enum": [
            "hosted_confirmation",
            "redirect"
          ],
          "type": "string"
        }
      },
      "description": "Behavior after the purchase is complete."
    },
    "allow_promotion_codes": {
      "type": "boolean",
      "description": "Enables user redeemable promotion codes."
    },
    "automatic_tax": {
      "title": "automatic_tax_params",
      "required": [
        "enabled"
      ],
      "type": "object",

        "enabled": {
          "type": "boolean"

      },
      "description": "Configuration for automatic tax collection."

      "enum": [
        "auto",

      "anyOf": [
        {
          "type": "array",

            "title": "custom_field_param",

              "key",
              "label",
              "type"

            "type": "object",

              "dropdown": {
                "title": "custom_field_dropdown_param",

                  "options"
                ],
                "type": "object",
                "properties": {
                  "options": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                      "title": "custom_field_option_param",
                      "required": [
                        "label",
                        "value"
                      ],
                      "type": "object",

                        "label": {
                          "maxLength": 100,
                          "type": "string"

                          "maxLength": 100,

                        }
                      }
                    }
                  }
                }
              },
              "key": {
                "maxLength": 200,
                "type": "string"
              },
              "label": {
                "title": "custom_field_label_param",
                "required": [
                  "custom",
                  "type"
                ],
                "type": "object",
                "properties": {
                  "custom": {
                    "maxLength": 50,
                    "type": "string"
                  },
                  "type": {
                    "enum": [
                      "custom"
                    ],
                    "type": "string"
                  }
                }
              },
              "optional": {
                "type": "boolean"
              },
              "type": {
                "enum": [
                  "dropdown",
                  "numeric",
                  "text"
                ],
                "type": "string"
              }
            }
          }
        },
        {
          "enum": [
            ""
          ],
          "type": "string"
        }
      ],
      "description": "Collect additional information from your customer using custom fields. Up to 2 fields are supported."
    },
    "custom_text": {
      "title": "custom_text_param",
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "shipping_address": {
          "anyOf": [
            {
              "title": "custom_text_position_param",
              "required": [
                "message"
              ],
              "type": "object",
              "properties": {
                "message": {
                  "maxLength": 1000,
                  "type": "string"
                }
              }
            },
            {
              "enum": [
                ""
              ],
              "type": "string"
            }
          ]
        },
        "submit": {
          "anyOf": [
            {
              "title": "custom_text_position_param",
              "required": [
                "message"
              ],
              "type": "object",
              "properties": {
                "message": {
                  "maxLength": 1000,
                  "type": "string"
                }
              }
            },
            {
              "enum": [
                ""
              ],
              "type": "string"
            }
          ]
        }
      },
      "description": "Display additional text for your customers using custom text."
    },
    "customer_creation": {
      "enum": [
        "always",
        "if_required"
      ],
      "type": "string",
      "description": "Configures whether checkout sessions created by this payment link create a Customer."
    },
    "expand": {
      "type": "array",
      "items": {
        "maxLength": 5000,
        "type": "string"
      },
      "description": "Specifies which fields in the response should be expanded."
    },
    "invoice_creation": {
      "title": "invoice_creation_update_params",
      "required": [
        "enabled"
      ],
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "enabled": {
          "type": "boolean"
        },
        "invoice_data": {
          "title": "invoice_settings_params",
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "account_tax_ids": {
              "anyOf": [
                {
                  "type": "array",
                  "items": {
                    "maxLength": 5000,
                    "type": "string"

                },
                {
                  "enum": [
                    ""
                  ],
                  "type": "string"
                }
              ]
            },

              "anyOf": [
                {
                  "type": "array",

                      "name": {

              "anyOf": [

                  "type": "object",

                    "type": "string"
                  }

                {
                  "enum": [
                    ""
                  ],
                  "type": "string"
                }
              ]
            },
            "rendering_options": {
              "anyOf": [
                {
                  "title": "rendering_options_param",

                      "enum": [

                      ],
                      "type": "string"
                    }
                  }
                },
                {
                  "enum": [
                    ""
                  ],
                  "type": "string"
                }
              ]
            }
          }
        }
      },
      "description": "Generate a post-purchase Invoice for one-time payments."
    },
    "line_items": {
      "type": "array",
      "items": {
        "title": "line_items_update_params",
        "required": [
          "id"
        ],
        "type": "object",
        "properties": {
          "adjustable_quantity": {
            "title": "adjustable_quantity_params",
            "required": [
              "enabled"
            ],
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
              "enabled": {
                "type": "boolean"
              },
              "maximum": {
                "type": "integer"
              },
              "minimum": {
                "type": "integer"
              }
            }
          },
          "id": {
            "maxLength": 5000,
            "type": "string"
          },
          "quantity": {
            "type": "integer"
          }
        }
      },
      "description": "The line items representing what is being sold. Each line item represents an item being sold. Up to 20 line items are supported."
    },
    "metadata": {
      "type": "object",
      "additionalProperties": {
        "type": "string"
      },
      "description": "Set of key-value pairs that you can attach to an object. This can be useful for storing additional information about the object in a structured format. Individual keys can be unset by posting an empty value to them. All keys can be unset by posting an empty value to metadata. Metadata associated with this Payment Link will automatically be copied to checkout sessions created by this payment link."
    },
    "payment_method_collection": {
      "enum": [
        "always",
        "if_required"
      ],
      "type": "string",
      "description": "Specify whether Checkout should collect a payment method. When set to if_required, Checkout will not collect a payment method when the total due for the session is 0.This may occur if the Checkout Session includes a free trial or a discount.\n\nCan only be set in subscription mode.\n\nIf you'd like information on how to collect a payment method outside of Checkout, read the guide on configuring subscriptions with a free trial."
    },
    "payment_method_types": {
      "anyOf": [
        {
          "type": "array",
          "items": {
            "enum": [
              "affirm",
              "afterpay_clearpay",
              "alipay",

            ""
          ],
          "type": "string"
